column1: What can't talk but will reply when spoken to?@An echo@Hello... Hello... Hello...

column2: the less you see. What is it?@The dark@Carrots help you see in...

column1: What color is the wind?@Blew@I ___ into the whistle

column2: but no houses. I have mountains

column1: What English word has three consecutive double letters?@Bookkeeper@Who keeps books?

column3: you raise it like it’s the best. What is it?@A thumb@___'s up
